title: Graduate School Prep - Scattered Information
prompt: I'm applying to graduate school and there are so many fees involved. The application fees are due in November - $120 per school and I'm applying to 8 schools. Then there's the GRE test in October for $220. My current income is $3800 monthly with expenses of about $3100. I'll also need to visit 3 schools for interviews in December, probably $800 per trip. Starting balance is $1500 in October 2024, and I want to plan through January 2025 to be safe.
